What I do

Front End Developement

I really want to create websites with criteria which are fast, small and perfect pixel, compatible with all devices, automated with webpack and gulp, The most important things are satisfying with maintain easily and scaling for feature module

Javascript Development

Javascript is easy to learn, but hard to be a master. I have already approached to VanillaJS, ReactJS and VueJS. Therefore, I want to apply my knowledge to future projects to get more and more my own experiences.

Shopify Developement

I have deployed numerous Shopify stores with varying levels of complexity, integrated various apps into the themes, optimized them for the best performance, and customized them flexibly.
